Tooltip: Your rats live in squalor and never brush their teeth. Now their bites shut down your enemies' organs. Deal ramping damage that ignores armor.

Unleash the plague onto all nearby hordes or human controlled locations by sacrificing 30% of your population. If you spread it to a horde, they suffer from reduced armor and increased resource needs for one minute. Pest exterminators extend their patrol radius. Gain immunity to disease.
Your rats thrive in the city sewers, gaining a boost to all basal stats in the city. You can use the sewers to instantly travel between cities you control.

What do your rats hate more than humans? The advent of modern medicine. Gain an instant 10% boost to all stats, and every subsequent disease type mutation grants the same buff. Additionally, any disease abilities you have that do combat damage are 10% more effective.
Your rats are having trouble keeping their flesh on their bones. You armor is reduced by 20% but the corpses of your fallen souls deal damage to your enemies with their noxious gases.

Your time in grassy lands has given your rats the chance to rediscover the wonders of irrigation. All resource output in grassy lands is increased by 20%. Additionally, gain the ability to convert other POIs into farms.
